column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The Jinya tonkatsu black was flavorless
column2: I also had the spicy tonkatsu which was a bit better but I didn't like the thick noodles so much. I'm not going to critique on that because it's preference. I find that it's over priced for what it is
column3: also having to add on an egg to the dish for an additional charge where it's usually part of the dish in most restaurants I didn't like the idea of. I get it if the dish was inexpensive but lunch for 2 at nearly $30 you get a lot better and all we ordered was 2 bowls of noodles is a bit too much.
